title: Windows XP Professional SP3 x86 - Black Edition 2014.9.25
description:

                              !//
                              (o o)
--------------------------oOOo-(_)-oOOo-------------------------
   Windows XP Professional SP3 x86 - Black Edition 2014.9.25
----------------------------------------------------------------
  For bug reports and questions go to http://www.zone54.com
================================================================


[#] SHORT SUMMARY:
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Includes all the latest Official and POSReady 2009 and some Unofficial Windows XP Updates until 23.9.2014 including with Windows Media Player 11, Internet Explorer 8, .NET Framework 1.1-4.0 and over 400 MB of additional SATA/AHCI, RAID, LAN, Wi-Fi, WiMax, Bluetooth and Chipset drivers (With Recovery Console and Repair option) and including with some optional Programs and Pre-Configured Settings and much more.
2. Will receive Windows XP Updates until April 2019 and passes all Validation Checks and no Windows XP Activation or Crack or CD-Key is needed, A valid WGA CD-Key and all the other user required inputs are filled in automatically during the Windows XP installation (Unattended Installation).
3. Contains a text file with lots of useful informations, such as, for example, how to reinstall Windows XP and how to install Windows XP with a USB Flash Drive and how to integrate your own Drivers, and much more.
4. System Requirements are (Recommended/Minimum): 1200/400 MegaHertz x86 Processor, 512/128 MegaBytes of RAM, 1024Ãƒâ€”768/800x600 Video Adapter, 10/5 GigaByte of available Hard Disk space.


[#] INCLUDES:
----------------------------------------------------------------

(o) Windows XP Updates:

* Windows XP Service Pack 3 (KB936929).
* All Official and POSReady 2009 and some Unofficial Windows XP (QFE/LDR) Updates until 23.9.2014.
* Windows Genuine Advantage Validation v1.9.42.0 (KB905474) {Cracked}.
* Windows Internet Explorer 8 (Up-to-Date) {Roll Back to 6 Possible}.
* Windows Media Player 11 (Up-to-Date) {Roll Back to 9 Possible}.
* Windows Remote Desktop Connection 7.0 (Up-to-Date).
* Windows Rights Management Client (KB979099). 
* Windows Feature Pack for Storage v1.0 (KB952013) - Image Mastering API v2.0 (IMAPIv2.0) Update for Blu-Ray Media.
* Windows Feature Pack for Storage v1.0 (KB952013) - ICCD Smart Card Driver.
* Windows Installer v4.5 (KB942288).
* Windows XP exFAT file system driver update package v1.0 (KB955704).
* Windows XP Root Certificates Update Version July 2014 (KB931125 & KB2982792).
* Windows XP CAPICOM v2.1.0.2 (KB931906).
* Microsoft European Union Expansion Font Update v1.2.
* Microsoft XML Core Services v4.0 SP3 4.30.2117.0 (KB2758694).
* Microsoft Update Catalog Web Control v7.4.7057.249.
* Microsoft Update Web Control v7.6.7600.257.
* Microsoft Windows Update Web Control v7.6.7600.257.
* Microsoft Windows Browser Choice (KB976002 v5).

(o) Windows XP Runtime Libraries Updates:

* Microsoft .NET Framework (Up-to-Date) 1.1 SP1, 2.0 SP2, 3.0 SP2, 3.5 SP1, 4.0 Full - {Optional}.
* Microsoft DirectX 9.0c v9.29.1974 (June 2010).
* Microsoft Visual C-family (Up-to-Date) v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6, v7, v8, v9, v10, v11 v12.
* Microsoft Visual Basic (Up-to-Date) v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6, v7.

(o) Additional Runtime Libraries:

* Flash Player ActiveX Control v15.0.0.167 - {Optional}.
* Flash Player Netscape Plugin v15.0.0.152 - {Optional}.
* Java SE Runtime Environment (JRE) v7 Update 67 - {Optional}.

(o) Windows XP Applications:

* Microsoft Calculator Plus v1.0.0.908 {Replaces the default Calculator}.
* Microsoft BitLocker To Go Reader v1.0 (KB970401).
* Windows XP Powertoy - ClearType Tuner v1.01 - {Optional}.
* Windows XP Powertoy - Alt-Tab Replacement v1.0 - {Optional}.
* Windows XP User Profile Hive Cleanup Service v1.6g - {Optional}.
* Windows XP GDI+ Detection Tool v1 (KB873374).
* Windows XP QFEcheck v6.2.29.0 (KB282784).

(o) Additional Applications:

* 7-Zip v9.20 - {Optional}.
* Mozilla Firefox v32.0.3 - {Optional}.
* K-Lite Standard Codec Pack v10.7.5 - {Optional}.
* WinCDEmu v3.6 - {Optional}.
* SumatraPDF v2.5.2 - {Optional}.
* Unlocker v1.9.2 - {Optional}.
* HashCheck Shell Extension v2.1.11 - {Optional}.

(o) Extras:

* Newer Files from Windows Embedded POSReady 2009: explorer.exe (v6.0.2900.5669), logon.scr (v5.1.2600.5669), msgina.dll (v5.1.2600.5669), sysdm.cpl (v5.1.2600.5669), user32.dll (v5.1.2600.5669), winbrand.dll (v5.1.2600.5669), xpsp3res.dll (v5.1.2600.5669).
* DriverPacks BASE v11.09.01.2e - Including Driver Packs: MassStorage v14.05.17.6 (SATA/AHCI, RAID), Chipset v14.05.19.1, LAN v14.08.06.1, WLAN v14.08.06.1 (Wi-Fi, WiMax, Bluetooth) - Compressed = 64 MB / Uncompressed = 430 MB - {Removable}.
* 7 Additional Windows XP Themes - {Optional}: "Windows XP Embedded", "Black Mesa v2.0", "ChaNinja Style RC5 v1.0", "Disney - It's a Magical World v1.0", "Luna Element Black v5.1 + CSS", "Royale Remixed v1.47", "Windows 7 Colors v1.0".
* Text file with valid WGA CD-Keys [In folder "*.isoOEMWXPPx86BE"].
* Windows NT Registration Changer v1.0 [In folder "*.isoOEMWXPPx86BE"].
* Windows XP CD-Key Changer v1.2 [In folder "*.isoOEMWXPPx86BE"].

(o) Windows XP Patches:

* Extended Update Support Patch v1.0: Will extend the Windows XP update support from "April 2014" to "April 2019" (POSReady 2009 Updates). 
* TCP/IP Patch v1.0: Allows you to have 16777215 (Maximum) Half-Open TCP Connections instead of 10.
* Uxtheme Patch v1.0: Allows you to use un-signed Custom Visual Styles (Themes).
* dotNET 4 NGEN Patch v3.1: Fixes a Microsoft .NET Framework 4 bug that causes a slow Windows XP boot up.
* NTDETECT Patch v1.1: Resolves problems with some buggy BIOS'es, when installing Windows XP with an USB Flash Drive.
* RAID-5 Patch v1.0: Enables Software RAID-5 Support.
* Fixed missing ClipBook Viewer shortcut in the Start menu.
* Fixed changing of the Internet and E-mail item on the Start menu (KB2926765->KB975713).

(o) Windows XP Tweaks:

* Pre-Configured Windows XP and Program Settings - {Optional}.
* Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows Genuine Advantage Notifications v1.9.40.0 (KB905474).
* Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows XP End Of Service Notifications (KB2934207).
* Suppressing Microsoft Update nagging to install Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool v5.16.10602.0 (KB890830).


[#] REMOVED:
----------------------------------------------------------------

* Nothing was removed that could cause System or Software problems and only outdated components were removed.
1. Applications: "Address Book".
2. Multimedia: "Images and Backgrounds", "Movie Maker", "Music Samples", "Old CDPlayer and Sound Recorder".
3. Network: "MSN Explorer", "Netmeeting", "Outlook Express", "Windows Messenger".
4. Operating System Options: "Blaster/Nachi removal tool", "Desktop Cleanup Wizard", "Out of Box Experience (OOBE)", "Tour".
5. 3rd-party Drivers: "Display Adapters", "ISDN", "Logitech WingMan", "Microsoft SideWinder", "Printers", "Scanners", "Serial Pen Tablet", "Sony Jog Dial", "Toshiba DVD decoder card".
6. Disc Files: "clock.avi", "swtchbrd.bmp", "yahoo.bmp".
7. Disc Folders: "DOTNETFX", "SUPPORT", "VALUEADD", "I386WIN9XMIG", "I386WIN9XUPG".
